summary:
Add new follower to game. she can found in the drunken huntsman whiterun. 
Not requrement any mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i325.photobucket.com/albums/k392/demonoidp/AyuSonia_zps6606ecf2.jpg[/img]
Add new follower to game. she can found in the drunken hustman whiterun. 
Not requrement any mod. mod is standalone. ayu is essential and not marriageable follower.

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]follower detail :[/color] [/b][/size]
Race : Breton
Name : Ayu Sonia
Level : 1-75
Body : CBBE / UNP
Default Armor : iron armor
Default weapon :steel sword
Location : the drunken huntsman in whiterun
Magic : Conjure Familiar, flame, fast healing
perk : restoration novice, regeneration, restoration apprentice,  conjuration novice, destruction novice, juggernaut 00, agile defender 00, light foot, armsman.

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Installation[/color] [/b][/size]
simply use NMM 
Manual installation, just copy file  to skyrim data folder.

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Unistallation[/color] [/b][/size]
first dismiss ayu sonia as your follower.
simply use NMM 
Manual uninstallation for version 1.2 or above just remove file below from skyrim data folder :
-Ayufollower.esp
-Ayufollower.bsa
Manual uninstallation for version 1.0-1.1, just remove file below from skyrim data folder
- Ayufollower.esp
- meshes\\actors\\character\\Asonia
- meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\AyuFollower.esp
- textures\\actors\\character\\Asonia
- textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\AyuFollower.esp

you must uninstall older version first before upgrade to new version.

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Version history [/color] [/b][/size]
1.3
-fix vampire eye issue 
Note: if you use main files cbbe body version, then you must download update file to fix combat ai.
1.2
- use texture from SG Female Textures Renewal to replace default texture in UNP/CBBE body.
- add bsa file.
1.1
-fix issue follower only use heavy armor by adding Agile Defender 00 perk. now she can use both heavy armor and light armor. But remember she is spellsword, and she automatically fokus on heavy armor when level up. 
-Add UNP body version.
1.0
Add new follower in game.

[size=+2][color=red]Credit & thanks[/color][/size]
